title: Shark Tank Says an Emotional Goodbye to Mark Cuban — Will You Still Watch Without Him?
description: Mark Cuban has heard his final pitch on Shark Tank. The billionaire investor said goodbye to ABC’s long-running business pitch competition on Friday’s season finale after 15 seasons as a “Shark.” (Cuban first announced his exit in November 2023.) The four pitches on Friday’s finale were pretty standard: Cuban teamed up with Barbara Corcoran to […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: Grosse Pointe Garden Society Plants Seeds for Possible Season 2 as Fate Remains TBD — Read Recap
description: Did a bad seed just spoil the bunch on Grosse Pointe Garden Society? The NBC dramedy — which has yet to be renewed for a Season 2 — wrapped its freshman run on Friday with a twist: One of our gardeners has committed a surprising act of betrayal. Early in the finale, Alice learns the […]
author: Claire Franken

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
